name: Fat 2 Fit
description:
Enjoy the best game to be fit in body race. All sizes are wonderful and necessary to win the game. There is no weight limit but choose your diet wisely as sometimes burgers are yummy but fat and the cucumber is king to be fit from fat.

There is no weight limit on beauty! Own the runway and body race to the finish line to stun in cutting-edge fashion. Stay body positive because every body is beautiful. But, along the way on the body race to be fit from fat, you'll be met by various obstacles like various food items burgers and fitness gear like dumbbell. Catch the ones that help you hit the target body shape and win beautiful prize. Get fit to win! Avoid those tasty but BAD burgers, feed on cucumbers, and get through the obstacles.
